selected_quotes: New research about tricking the brain could offer to hope to the thousands of people living with chronic pain
New research shows the brain can be tricked into feeling pain relief #painscience
New research shows it might be possible to train your brain to feel less pain
New research shows we can trick the mind info relief from acute pain, potential benefits for #chronicpain.

blogs.summary: New research shows that as well as tricking the mind into feeling distracted from pain, the brain also seems to be able to be tricked into experiencing pain relief.

author.name: Forum:Blog
author.description: The official blog of the World Economic Forum, better known for the Annual Meeting in Davos, Switzerland.
